title: Psychiatric Nursing Simulation-Based Learning: Competency Enhancement Through Virtual Game Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Mental Health Nursing and Patient Interaction Experience
context.additional_context: A customized educational program for health management administrators/leaders in large corporations to enhance core psychiatric nursing competencies. Operated with real-time online lectures and virtual simulations in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply therapeutic communication skills with over 80% accuracy when assessing psychiatric patients via VGS.
Learners can safely handle three or more complex psychiatric scenarios (e.g., manic, depressive episodes) in simulation environments.
Learners can use self-directed learning tools to develop plans for applying two or more simulation strategies to real work environments within two weeks post-training.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
